entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9626] It is expected that ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of 27,000,000 reported in the network role http://www.adp.com/role/StatementConsolidatedStatementsOfComprehensiveIncome should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ComprehensiveIncome with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of 525,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.adp.com/role/StatementConsolidatedStatementsOfChangesInEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2019-01-01 to 2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -6 Decimals of ComprehensiveIncome : -6 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/969500PJMBSFHYC37989/2020-12-31/ESEF/FR/0/adp-2020-12-31AR.zip/adp-2020-12-31AR/reports/adp-2020-12-31AR.xhtml 41950

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9628] It is expected that ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests with a value of 525,000,000 reported in the network role http://www.adp.com/role/StatementConsolidatedStatementsOfComprehensiveIncome should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ComprehensiveIncome with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:NoncontrollingInterestsMember and a reported value of 27,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.adp.com/role/StatementConsolidatedStatementsOfChangesInEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests fact are:
Period : 2019-01-01 to 2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests : -6 Decimals of ComprehensiveIncome : -6 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/969500PJMBSFHYC37989/2020-12-31/ESEF/FR/0/adp-2020-12-31AR.zip/adp-2020-12-31AR/reports/adp-2020-12-31AR.xhtml 41950
